name: The Soul Stone
description: The Soul Stone is one of the two first known artifacts in existence, it's capable of granting a soul and consciousness to anything created by and exclusively by the "Infinity Box", those who are granted a soul by the stone and can reproduce are also able to grant a soul, the only downside is that their soul isn't pure. Its abilities can be very helpful but it has its limitations, it cannot grant a soul to any creature that has died. The artifact is currently guarded by "The Soul Guardian".
